[File: stacks-core/stacks-common/src/util/uint.rs] [Function: Mul::mul()] [Expensive Operation] The multiplication loop iterates 2 * $n_words times - for Uint512, this is 16 iterations. Can an attacker trigger many expensive multiplications to DoS transaction validation? (Medium)
